LocalRunner (autotransform.runner.local)

A GithubberRunner component, which is used to trigger a workflow on Github which runs a schema.

class autotransform.runner.local.LocalRunner(params: autotransform.runner.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.runner.base.Runner[autotransform.runner.local.LocalRunnerParams]

A Runner component that runs a Schema locally on the machine.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Runner.

Type

LocalRunnerParams

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.runner.local.LocalRunner

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the LocalRunner.

Return type

LocalRunner

static get_type() → autotransform.runner.type.RunnerType

Used to map Runner components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Runner.

Return type

RunnerType

run(schema: autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema) → None

Triggers a full run of a Schema locally.

Parameters

schema (AutoTransformSchema) – The schema that will be run.

class autotransform.runner.local.LocalRunnerParams

Bases: TypedDict

The params required for a LocalRunner instance.
